name: Oh Tamanegiyarou Chindouchyu
description:
AGBIC 2017 Game Jam submission
This was my first code project. It is mostly an exhibition of some really great chip tune music and my pixel art. 

Setup for use on WINNITRON

Up Down Left Right

PERIOD key to shoot

Enter to start or restart

Esc to go back to main menu and quit

Chiptune music produced by Mark Sparling
https://twitter.com/Markymark665
